string.value: Where is this? What's going on? You don't even know who you are.

#p1202001# seems to be really excited at having met a hero. A hero? Who…you? Judging from what #p1201000# is saying, maybe you really were a hero in your past life. But you have no recollection of it…

Since drinking the potion, your HP recovered quite a bit. You still don't know what's going on, but considering how nicely everyone's been treating you, they must have good intentions. You should have no trouble going back to town now...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Go on to 'The Weapon That Disappeared' quest\r\n
Don't feel like you need to save this potion for later use. Just drink it! It's not much, but it'll be enough to restore some of your HP.
